Plot correlation between #cluster members and any other variable

Source: R/plotCluster.R
plotCluster.Rd

Visualize the correlation between the Cluster Number generated by LTRpred and any other variable and color each putative LTR transposon by it's e.g. superfamily name.

plotCluster(data, y = "CG_3ltr_rel", color.by = "fam",
  quality.filter = FALSE, sim = 70, n.orfs = 1, chop.names = TRUE,
  xlab = "# CLUSTER MEMBERS", ylab = "", main = "",
  legend.title = "Protein Domain")

Arguments

data

data.frame returned by LTRpred.
y

column name in data (lazy evaluation) that shall be correlated with cn_3ltr (copy number of predicted 3' LTR).
color.by

color points by a column name in data (lazy evaluation).
quality.filter

shall a quality filter be applied to reduce false positives?
sim

filter minimum sequence similarity between the LTRs.
n.orfs

filter for minimum number of orfs.
chop.names

shall superfamily names be chopped?
xlab

x-axis label.
ylab

y-axis label.
main

main text.
legend.title

legend text.

Contents

  • Arguments
